title: we need full time dominion ! >:[
body:
Dominion was my favourite game mode back on NA, it was the mode I used to learn new champions without people raging/hating on me being bad. 

Please make perm ty

replies.body:
Not gonna happen,

As they clearly stated dominion got old and stale because they left it as like a bonus game-mode. Now that they have it on rotation it is thriving a lot more, and they aren't gonna send it down the path of "these groups of players like it" versus "every couple of months everyone can enjoy it".

So stop putting your self in the mindset that Riot will listen to you on this server because if you haven't realized by now;

THEY WON'T
